<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Servant](/NPCs.aspx?ID=912)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Maids, butlers, and majordomos alike, servants are skilled at keeping a home in working order and protecting the interests of their employers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Laborer_Servant.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Servant](/NPCs.aspx?ID=912)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 222</row>

**Perception** +9

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +4, [Household Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +2

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
cutlery (10), [servant's uniform](/Equipment.aspx?ID=15), serving platter (Hardness 3, HP 6, BT 3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 (16 with platter raised)

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 9

**Raise a Shield** <actions string="Single Action" /> The serving platter has the same statistics as a [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1), but requires a hand to hold.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
cutlery +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
cutlery +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

</column>
